author: Rajulapudi Srinivas
text:
Two activists of the Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) suffered minor injuries when members of a student organisation, who organised JNU Students Union president Kanhaiya Kumar’s meeting, clashed with them at a hotel here on Thursday.

Police had a tough time in controlling the situation and resorted to mild lathi-charge to disperse the mob. They took many protesters into custody.

Cases booked

The city police booked cases against Bharatiya Janata Yuva Morcha (BJYM), ABVP leaders and members of other organisations who staged a protest at JNU president Kanhaiya Kumar’s meeting, and those who attacked the ABVP and BJYM activists.
title: Two injured in clash at student leader’s meeting
